items.title: Steve Jobs Said This is When Great Bosses Say ‘I,’ Not ‘We’
items.description: Granted, we’re taught to say ‘we.’ But Jobs felt there were times ‘I’ is the only pronoun you should use.

items.title: Spanx Founder Sara Blakely Swears These 7 Words Built Her Success—and Most Leaders Avoid Them
items.description: How a simple question shaped Sara Blakely’s resilience—and how it can transform the way your team takes risks.

items.title: Why You Should Swap Scrolling Social Media for an ‘Analog Bag’
items.description: Yes, it’s ironic, but the new TikTok trend of ‘analog bags’ really can help you have a saner, healthier relationship to social media.

items.title: How Costco Turns Loss Leaders Into an Art Form (And Why Your Business Might Want to Copy Them)
items.description: Just because it’s simple to explain doesn’t mean it’s easy to execute.

items.title: AI Dynamic Pricing Is Perfect For Companies That Want to Lose Customers
items.description: The good news is they’ll definitely make a few extra dollars along the way.
